address.edit.name: Edit name
amb.market.circulating.supply.popup: The amount of coins that are circulating in the market and are in public hands. It is analogous to the flowing shares in the stock market.
amb.market.fully.diluted.market.cap.popu: A measure of the total value of a cryptocurrency's circulating supply, calculated by multiplying the current price by the number of coins in circulation.
amb.market.market.cap.popup: A measure of the total value of a cryptocurrency's circulating supply, calculated by multiplying the current price by the number of coins in circulation.
amb.market.max.supply.popup: The maximum amount of coins that will ever exist in the lifetime of the cryptocurrency, indicating the limit of its potential supply.
amb.market.statistics.text: AirDAO is a pioneering community-governed layer one blockchain and web3 ecosystem powered by AMB. Our products enable financial equality and social inclusion, and we’re dedicated to making web3 more democratized and accessible to all. Your vision, our future. We build together.
amb.market.total.supply.popup: The amount of coins that have been already created, minus any coins that have been burned, providing a measure of the current supply of a cryptocurrency.
common.no.transactions: You will see your transactions here
create.wallet.backup.text: Your wallet will be backed up with a
create.wallet.checkbox.text: I understand that if I lose my recovery phrase, AirDAO cannot restore it.
create.wallet.prepare: Make sure you have a pen and paper ready so you can write it down.
create.wallet.recovery.phrase.modal.head: What is a recovery phrase?
create.wallet.recovery.phrase.modal.text: Your recovery phrase is a set of 12 random words, and it's the only way to get into your wallet if you lose your device.
create.wallet.success.text: You backed up your wallet. Now let’s setup your wallet’s security.
create.wallet.tap.words.in.correct.order: Tap the words in the correct order
create.wallet.verification.alert:
Never share recovery phrase with 
anyone, keep it safe!
create.wallet.verify.text: Make sure to write it down as shown. You will verify this later.
empty.addresses: Add an address to your watchlist and track any wallet

empty.notifications: You have no notifications right now.
explore.search.check.typos: Please check for any typos or try a different address
notification.settings.price.alerts.tresh: Set 24hr price change amount to receive notifications.
notification.settings.transaction.alerts: Get notified of transactions in your watchlist.
receive.funds.amb.network.only: Assets can only be sent within the AirDAO network
send.funds.error.insufficient.balance: Insufficient balance to pay the network fee. Adjust the amount or top up wallet to proceed.
send.funds.error.private.key.not.found: Private key not found. Please backup your wallet with your seed phrase again!
import.wallet.description: Enter the recovery phrase to import your wallet.
import.wallet.success.text: Your wallet has been imported. You can now access your funds.
import.wallet.title: Enter recovery phrase

no.wallet.stay.informed.description: Get updates for transactions and important wallet activity.
